mapper.select: SELECT BUYER_ID, BUYER_NAME, BUYER_LGU , BUYER_BANK, BUYER_BANKNO, BUYER_BANKNAME , BUYER_ZIP, BUYER_ADD1, BUYER_ADD2 , BUYER_COMTEL, BUYER_FAX, BUYER_MAIL , BUYER_CHARGER, BUYER_TELEXT , LPROD_GU, LPROD_NM , PROD_ID, PROD_NAME, PROD_COST , PROD_PRICE, PROD_SALE, PROD_MILEAGE FROM BUYER INNER JOIN LPROD ON (BUYER_LGU = LPROD_GU) LEFT OUTER JOIN PROD ON (BUYER_ID = PROD_BUYER) WHERE BUYER_ID = #{buyerId}
